description.narrative: The revised Project Development Objectives are: (i) to contribute to the gradual reduction of road transport costs and improve access, ease of transit and safety along the central part of Georgia's East-West corridor, through upgrading segments of the East-West Highway from Tbilisi to Rikoti, including the rehabilitation of the Rikoti Tunnel; and (ii) to strengthen the capacity of the government, Roads Department and the local road construction industry to plan and better manage the road network.

provider-org.narrative: International Development Association

condition.narrative: By or before February 28, 2007, RDMED shall appoint an independant auditor under ToRs acceptable to the Association
RDMED shall ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with the provisions of the EIA, EMP and RPF. RDMED shall notassign, amend, abrogate or waive those provisions.
RDMED shall ensure that the Project is carried out in accordance with the provisions of the EMP and the RFP
RDMED shall prepare Progress Reports in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.08 of the General Conditiond and be furnishedto the Association not later than 45 days after the end of the period
RDMED shall, prior to the commencement of works under the Project, ensure that the provisions of the EMP are adequately includedinthe proposed contract(s) for said works.
RDMED through TRRC shall have its Financial Statements audited in accordance with the provisions of Section 4.09 (b) of theGeneralConditions
RDMED, through TRRC shall maintain a financial management system in accordance with the provision of Section 4.09 of the GeneralConditions
RDMED, through TRRC shall prepare and furnish to the Association not later than 45 days after the end of each calendar quarter,interim un-audited financial reports

The Borrower shall by not later than April 10, 2010 establish within RD (a) a traffic safety unit; (b) an environmental unit; and(c) a land acquisition unit with staff whose qualifications, experience and terms of reference are satisfactory to the Bank.
The Borrower shall ensure that adequate budgetary resources are made available for the Project in the Borrower's annual budget forthe duration of the Project
The Borrower shall ensure that adequate budgetary resources are made available for the maintenance of the Rikoti tunnel after thecompletion of the rehabilitation works.
